meta.name: description
meta.value: Prompt user to confirm turning off the Announce Notifications feature.

parameter.name: setting
parameter.description: The setting that the user asked about.

parameter.name: requestedValue
parameter.description: This is true if the user asked to turn on the setting, and false if the user asked to turn it off.

parameter.name: deviceState
parameter.description: Contains details about the userâ€™s device.

parameter.name: confirmationMode
parameter.description: Indicates whether user has connected headphones or carplay or both in the past.

parameter.name: appName
parameter.description: The name of the app whose notifications should be turned off.
